About Us
Good Food.
Good Beer. Great Times.
Located in the heart of Wildwood, New Jersey, Dogtooth Bar & Grill has been a beloved destination for both locals and visitors since its inception in 2007. Founded by Brendan Sciarra, Dogtooth is a proud member of the MudHen Hospitality family, which also includes Poppi’s Brick Oven Pizza, MudHen Brewing Company, and The Hen Houses micro-resort .
Good Food.
Good Beer. Great Times.
Located in the heart of Wildwood, New Jersey, Dogtooth Bar & Grill has been a beloved destination for both locals and visitors since its inception in 2007. Founded by Brendan Sciarra, Dogtooth is a proud member of the MudHen Hospitality family, which also includes Poppi’s Brick Oven Pizza, MudHen Brewing Company, and The Hen Houses micro-resort .
Our Story
The inspiration behind Dogtooth Bar & Grill traces back to Brendan’s father, Mike Sciarra, a passionate surfer who established the iconic Kona Surf Co. after returning from Oahu in 1969. Brendan infused this legacy into Dogtooth, creating a space that celebrates surf culture and community. A surfboard from the original Kona Surf Shop proudly adorns our restaurant, symbolizing our deep-rooted connection to the ocean and local heritage .​
Culinary Experience
At Dogtooth, we pride ourselves on offering a diverse and creative menu that blends American comfort food with Asian and Mexican influences. Our dishes are crafted using fresh, locally sourced ingredients, ensuring quality and flavor in every bite. From signature appetizers like Volcano Shrimp and Dogtooth Bites to hearty entrees and delectable desserts, there’s something to satisfy everyone.
Family & Pet
-
Friendly Atmosphere
We believe in creating an inclusive environment where everyone feels welcome. Our kid-friendly menu, complete with coloring activities, ensures that our youngest guests have an enjoyable dining experience. Additionally, our outdoor patio is the only dog-friendly dining area in Wildwood, allowing you to share great times with your furry friends.​
Events & Entertainment
Dogtooth Bar & Grill is more than just a place to eat—it’s a hub for community and entertainment. We host a variety of events, including live music every week, Musingo Tuesdays, Paint & Sip nights, and special celebrations events. Our venue is also available for private events, offering catering services to make your gatherings memorable.
